docs.abstract: Lrs from Marvin Klapper, John Neufeld, Joel M Grossman, Dr Robert C Atkins and Werner J Cahnman on Dr Richard F Spark Jan 6 article on overweight Amers; Atkins scores article for misleading public into thinking obesity is caused by overeating alone; Spark replies
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Dr. Richard F. Spark's comments on "Fat Americans" (Jan. 6) were a fantastic blend of medical rhetoric and baloney. He ought to be forced to eat his words.
docs.snippet: To the Editor: Dr. Richard F. Spark's comments on "Fat Americans" (Jan. 6) were a fantastic blend of medical rhetoric and baloney. He ought to be forced to eat his words.

headline.main: State Study Warns Of Wide, Drug Use; Statistical Evidence

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.abstract: NJ Health Dept releases study showing that nearly 1/3 of regular users of amphetamines and barbiturates do so without proper med supervision; findings of study detailed (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: TRENTON - Proponents of stricter controls over the distribution of amphetamines and barbiturates have received new evidence of widespread abuse among users of the drugs.
docs.snippet: TRENTON - Proponents of stricter controls over the distribution of amphetamines and barbiturates have received new evidence of widespread abuse among users of the drugs.
